location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'AREA MAP REFINERY TO SHIPS ANCHORAGE BAHREIN'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprintDimensions: 670 x 970mm, on sheet 720 x 1020mm

mods.abstract: Area map produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company (BAPCO), showing the Bahrain Petroleum Company Refinery, Bahrein [Bahrain], Sitrah Terminal, and the sea area (including submarine lines) to the east of Sitrah Island.The map shows the following features:Concession boundaryCompany reservationspower linestelephone linesroads
